short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to automate data entry tasks with form filling and text extraction features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disclaimer: This method of integration is not allowed in EHRs unless you have explicit written permission from your EHR vendor. If your EHR rejects your request, you may consider using a different platform that provides write APIs.

This Chrome extension is intended for EHRs that do not have write APIs, making it the only available method for integration.

Product Description: Quickly create AI "Sequence Templates" to automatically fill specific custom forms in any order on any website.
